heroText: Help to build an open repository of data to digitally enrich your language
asrSloganText: Enrich your language by typing the audio that you hear
asrContributionSubtext: Contribute by typing what you hear on audio
asrValidationSubtext: Validate the texts transcribed by others
textSloganText: Enrich your language by donating your voice
textContributionSubtext: Contribute your voice by recording the sentence

parallelValidationSubtext: Validate the translations contributed by others

ocrValidationSubtext: Validate the images labelled by others

footerSocialShareText: Share it with your friends and family
socialSharingTextWithoutRank: I've contributed towards building open language repository for India on https://bhashini.gov.in/bhashadaan. Let's make a difference by contributing to Bhasha Daan and empower our languages.

contributeWarningMsg: Only validations invited for the selected language

metaTitle: Bhasha Daan: A crowdsourcing initiative for Indian languages (Beta)
metaDescription: Bhasha Daan: A crowdsourcing initiative for Indian languages. A speech recognition product, that will be as Indian, as you and I. It will also be free of cost for every Indian. Make it happen by donating your voice
metaOGTitle: Bhasha Daan: A crowdsourcing initiative for Indian languages

contributionTrackerSubHeader2: Your language pair and top 3 contributed language pairs
